languages.text: "При всем почтении к вашей персоне, Лорд-инквизитор, попрошу воздержаться от дальнейших угроз в адрес благословенного Вольного Торговца. Во избежание санкций с моей стороны".
"With all due respect to you, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed toward the blessed Rogue Trader. Lest you face repercussions from me."
languages.original_text: "При всем почтении к вашей персоне, Лорд-инквизитор, попрошу воздержаться от дальнейших угроз в адрес благословенного Вольного Торговца. Во избежание санкций с моей стороны".

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect to your persona, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed towards the blessed Rogue Trader. Or else I shall pull out your ears."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Sans vouloir vous offenser, seigneur inquisiteur, je vous prie de vous abstenir de menacer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, loué soit son nom. Sinon, vous aurez affaire à moi. »
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to you, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed toward the blessed Rogue Trader. Lest you face repercussions from me."

traits.locale_text: « Sans vouloir vous offenser, seigneur inquisiteur, je vous prie de vous abstenir de menacer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, loué soit son nom. Sinon, vous aurez affaire à moi. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Con todo el debido respeto, Lord Inquisidor, debo solicitar que evite amenazar a{mf|l| la} bendit{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente a menos que esté dispuesto a afrontar las represalias por mi parte».
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to you, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed toward the blessed Rogue Trader. Lest you face repercussions from me."

traits.locale_text: «Con todo el debido respeto, Lord Inquisidor, debo solicitar que evite amenazar a{mf|l| la} bendit{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente a menos que esté dispuesto a afrontar las represalias por mi parte».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “恕我直言，大审判官。我要求你不要再对神圣的行商浪人进行任何威胁，否则可能会遭到我的报复。”
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to you, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed toward the blessed Rogue Trader. Lest you face repercussions from me."

traits.locale_text: “恕我直言，审判长。我要求你不要再对神圣的行商浪人进行任何威胁，否则可能会遭到我的报复。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bei allem Respekt, Großinquisitor, ich muss Euch bitten, keine weiteren Drohungen gegen {mf|den gesegneten Freihändler|die gesegnete Freihändlerin} auszusprechen. Es drohen sonst Folgen."
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to you, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed toward the blessed Rogue Trader. Lest you face repercussions from me."

traits.locale_text: "Bei allem Respekt, Großinquisitor, ich muss Euch bitten, keine weiteren Drohungen gegen {mf|den gesegneten Freihändler|die gesegnete Freihändlerin} auszusprechen. Es drohen sonst Folgen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジター、あなたには敬意を表しはしますが、これ以上、祝福されし自由開拓者を脅かすようなマネはやめていただきたい。さもなくば、我からの報復を受ける羽目になるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to you, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed toward the blessed Rogue Trader. Lest you face repercussions from me."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジター、あなたには敬意を表しはしますが、これ以上、祝福されし自由開拓者を脅かすようなマネはやめていただきたい。さもなくば、我からの報復を受ける羽目になるでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, saygısızlık etmek istemem ama sizden kutsal Hür Tacir'e karşı tehditler savurmayı kesmenizi rica etmek zorundayım. Yoksa gerekeni yapmak zorunda kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to you, Lord Inquisitor, I shall ask you to refrain from any further threats directed toward the blessed Rogue Trader. Lest you face repercussions from me."
